entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kamouraska
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:10 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
